Name: Python
Description: Default orchestration language for mission analysis pipelines and automation tooling.

Name: NumPy + SciPy
Description: Numerical foundation for orbit dynamics, calibration math, and simulation workloads.

Name: PostgreSQL + PostGIS
Description: Reliable mission data backbone for telemetry indexing, geospatial joins, and service APIs.

Name: Containerized Workloads
Description: Core packaging model for reproducible deployment of processing and operations services.

Name: Orekit
Description: Core orbit propagation and astrodynamics library used across mission tooling.

Name: CCSDS Specifications
Description: Interoperability baseline for telemetry, telecommand, and mission data exchange.

Name: Apache Arrow
Description: In-memory columnar format that speeds analytics and interchange in pipelines.

Name: Apache Parquet
Description: Long-term storage format for large mission and geospatial analytics datasets.

Name: JupyterLab
Description: Standard interactive environment for mission prototyping and data validation.

Name: Kubernetes
Description: Core control plane for scaling mission data and processing services.

Name: CI/CD Pipelines
Description: Automated build/test/deploy backbone for mission software reliability.

Name: Prometheus + Grafana
Description: Baseline observability stack for service health, telemetry, and alerting.

Name: Git
Description: Version-control foundation for flight software, ground systems, and configs.

Name: Linux
Description: Primary execution environment across mission operations and backend systems.

Name: Terraform
Description: Core infrastructure-as-code layer for reproducible mission platform environments.

Name: CesiumJS
Description: Core web engine for interactive 3D space and geospatial visualization.

Name: Orekit
Description: Robust orbital mechanics library for mission analysis and tracking.

Name: GMAT
Description: Open-source mission design and trajectory optimization toolkit.

Name: Open MCT
Description: Telemetry visualization platform for mission operations consoles.

Name: Legacy Desktop Flight Tools
Description: Retain only when migration risk outweighs modernization benefits.

Name: Constellation Revisit Optimization
Description: Optimize orbital planes and tasking windows for target revisit goals.

Name: SAR Interferometry (InSAR)
Description: High-value deformation monitoring technique across large regions.

Name: Onboard Edge AI Inference
Description: Run inference near the sensor to reduce downlink pressure and latency.

Name: Cross-Sensor Fusion Pipelines
Description: Fuse optical, SAR, and thermal feeds into unified analytic products.

Name: Manual-Only Mission Planning
Description: Avoid for modern constellations where scale requires automation.

Name: Sentinel-2 L2A
Description: Baseline multispectral data source for many EO production workflows.

Name: Landsat Collection 2
Description: Long-term calibrated archive for time-series analysis.

Name: PlanetScope Daily Imagery
Description: Commercial high-frequency imagery for near-daily monitoring use cases.

Name: SWOT Hydrology Products
Description: Emerging water-surface data products with strong scientific upside.

Name: Uncalibrated Third-Party Feeds
Description: Avoid for critical analytics unless provenance and calibration are verified.

Name: CCSDS Telemetry and Telecommand
Description: Core interoperability standard for spacecraft data and command exchange.

Name: STAC for EO Catalogs
Description: Consistent metadata pattern for discoverable Earth observation assets.

Name: OGC API - Processes
Description: Standardized API contract for geospatial processing services.

Name: ISO 19115 Metadata
Description: Well-established metadata model for geospatial datasets and lineage.

Name: Proprietary Tasking Schemas
Description: Use only when no open alternative can meet mission requirements.
